sentence.Network_en: They arrived at the White House, proud, tense and unsure.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们来到白宫, 总是带着高傲, 紧张而又没有把握的神情.

sentence.Network_en: Jane is house - proud. She doesn't like anyone to stand on ceremony in her home.
sentence.Network_cn: 珍妮特别好客. 她不喜欢任何人在她家里过分拘泥于礼节.

sentence.Network_en: She's not only very capable, but also house - proud, arranging everything in the house apple - pie order.
sentence.Network_cn: 她不仅很能干, 而且特别讲究家里的摆设, 把家里收拾得井井有条.
